{{Lead|1 a|present|2}}

{{Lead|2 a|less than 20 %|3}}

{{Lead|4 b|same as ground coloration but dark around pads|9}}

{{Lead|5 a|longitudinally crossed by a brighter (ground coloration) line|11}}

{{Lead|6 a|longitudinally crossed by a brighter (ground coloration) line|12}}

{{Lead|7 a|absent|result=Genetta pardina}}

{{Lead|11 b|strong (twice as much inflated than ectotympanic bone)|result=Genetta thierryi}}
